name: Pleasure Puzzle:Workshop
description: The best jigsaw puzzle jigsaw workshop, super simple operation to create your Jigsaw to share with the whole world! After subscription, it can not only be used in games, but also can be saved as local pictures. Refreshing operation and pleasing to the eye! Leisure and fun! The picture is released in the form of free DLC.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Memory: 8 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
